xml.specific_character:
sarik_name ui_inGame2_ecolog_guard_blue
ah_sarik ecolog stalker_terrain characters_voice\human_02\stalker\ 0 10
actors\stalker_ecologist\stalker_ecolog_guard 0
[spawn] \n wpn_ak74u \n ammo_5.45x39_fmj = 2 \n #include "gameplay\character_food.xml" #include "gameplay\character_drugs.xml"
#include "gameplay\character_criticals.xml" hello_dialog sarik_dialog actor_break_dialog

kovalev_name ui_inGame2_ecolog_brown

actors\stalker_ecologist\stalker_ecolog_brown 0
[spawn] \n granade_f1 = 2 \n #include "gameplay\character_food.xml" #include "gameplay\character_drugs.xml"
